_getSFTStorage();\n\t\t$.name = name_;\n\t\t$.symbol = symbol_;\n\t\t$.updateOperators[firstOperator] = true;\n\t}\n\n\tmodifier canUpdate() {\n\t\tif (!isOperator(msg.sender)) {\n\t\t\trevert ActionNotAllowed(msg.sender);\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t_;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction isOperator(address operator) public view returns (bool) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().updateOperators[operator];\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Internal function to mint new tokens with attributes and store the nonce.\n\tfunction _mint(\n\t\taddress to,\n\t\tuint256 amount,\n\t\tbytes memory attributes\n\t) internal returns (uint256 nonce) {\n\t\tSFTStorage storage $ = _getSFTStorage();\n\t\tnonce = ++$.nonceCounter;\n\n\t\t// $tore the attributes\n\t\t$.tokenAttributes[nonce] = attributes;\n\n\t\t// Mint the token with the nonce as its ID\n\t\tsuper._mint(to, nonce, amount, \"\");\n\n\t\t// Track the nonce for the address\n\t\t$.addressToNonces[to].add(nonce);\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns the name of the token.\n\tfunction name() public view returns (string memory) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().name;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns the symbol of the token.\n\tfunction symbol() public view returns (string memory) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().symbol;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns the token name and symbol.\n\tfunction tokenInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory) {\n\t\treturn (name(), symbol());\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns raw token attributes by nonce.\n\t/// @param nonce The nonce of the token.\n\t/// @return Attributes in bytes.\n\tfunction _getRawTokenAttributes(\n\t\tuint256 nonce\n\t) internal view returns (bytes memory) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().tokenAttributes[nonce];\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns the list of nonces owned by an address.\n\t/// @param owner The address of the token owner.\n\t/// @return Array of nonces.\n\tfunction getNonces(address owner) public view returns (uint256[] memory) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().addressToNonces[owner].values();\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Checks if the address owns a specific nonce.\n\t/// @param owner The address of the token owner.\n\t/// @param nonce The nonce to check.\n\t/// @return True if the address owns the nonce, otherwise false.\n\tfunction hasSFT(address owner, uint256 nonce) public view returns (bool) {\n\t\treturn _getSFTStorage().addressToNonces[owner].contains(nonce);\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Burns the tokens of a specific nonce and mints new tokens with updated attributes.\n\t/// @param user The address of the token holder.\n\t/// @param nonce The nonce of the token to update.\n\t/// @param amount The amount of tokens to mint.\n\t/// @param attr The new attributes to assign.\n\t/// @return The new nonce for the minted tokens.\n\tfunction update(\n\t\taddress user,\n\t\tuint256 nonce,\n\t\tuint256 amount,\n\t\tbytes memory attr\n\t) public canUpdate returns (uint256) {\n\t\t_burn(user, nonce, amount);\n\t\treturn amount > 0 ? _mint(user, amount, attr) : 0;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Returns the balance of the user with their token attributes.\n\t/// @param user The address of the user.\n\t/// @return Array of SftBalance containing nonce, amount, and attributes.\n\tfunction _sftBalance(\n\t\taddress user\n\t) internal view returns (SftBalance[] memory) {\n\t\tuint256[] memory nonces = getNonces(user);\n\t\tSftBalance[] memory balance = new SftBalance[](nonces.length);\n\n\t\tfor (uint256 i; i < nonces.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tuint256 nonce = nonces[i];\n\t\t\tbytes memory attributes = _getRawTokenAttributes(nonce);\n\t\t\tuint256 amount = balanceOf(user, nonce);\n\n\t\t\tbalance[i] = SftBalance({\n\t\t\t\tnonce: nonce,\n\t\t\t\tamount: amount,\n\t\t\t\tattributes: attributes\n\t\t\t});\n\t\t}\n\n\t\treturn balance;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev Override _update to handle address-to-nonce mapping.\n\t/// @param from The address sending tokens.\n\t/// @param to The address receiving tokens.\n\t/// @param ids The token IDs being transferred.\n\t/// @param values The values of tokens being transferred.\n\tfunction _update(\n\t\taddress from,\n\t\taddress to,\n\t\tuint256[] memory ids,\n\t\tuint256[] memory values\n\t) internal virtual override {\n\t\tsuper._update(from, to, ids, values);\n\n\t\tfor (uint256 i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tuint256 id = ids[i];\n\n\t\t\t_getSFTStorage().addressToNonces[from].remove(id);\n\t\t\t_getSFTStorage().addressToNonces[to].add(id);\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0x6b2daba4ab82f71f50422e77879900a85e53de70a4b95379e3ee763effd42977","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/Epochs.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\n/// @title Epochs and Periods Management Library\n/// @notice Provides functions to manage and calculate epochs and periods based on a genesis timestamp and epoch length.\n/// @dev The epoch length is specified in seconds, and the period is calculated as 30 epochs.\nlibrary Epochs {\n\t// Struct to store epoch management parameters\n\tstruct Storage {\n\t\tuint256 genesis; // The genesis timestamp\n\t\tuint256 epochLength; // Length of each epoch in seconds\n\t}\n\n\t// Initialization Functions\n\n\t/// @notice Initializes the storage with the current timestamp as the genesis and sets the epoch length.\n\t/// @param self The storage struct to initialize.\n\t/// @param _epochLength The length of an epoch in seconds.\n\t/// @dev This function should be called in the contract constructor to set the initial genesis timestamp and epoch length.\n\tfunction initialize(Storage storage self, uint256 _epochLength) internal {\n\t\tself.genesis = block.timestamp;\n\t\tself.epochLength = _epochLength;\n\n\t\trequire(self.epochLength > 0, \"Invalid Epoch length\");\n\t}\n\n\t// View Functions\n\n\t/// @notice Returns the current epoch based on the genesis timestamp and epoch length.\n\t/// @param self The storage struct containing the genesis timestamp and epoch length.\n\t/// @return The current epoch number.\n\t/// @dev The epoch is calculated by dividing the time elapsed since genesis by the epoch length in seconds.\n\tfunction currentEpoch(\n\t\tStorage storage self\n\t) internal view returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn computeEpoch(self, block.timestamp);\n\t}\n\n\tfunction computeEpoch(\n\t\tStorage storage self,\n\t\tuint256 timestamp\n\t) internal view returns (uint256) {\n\t\trequire(self.epochLength > 0, \"Invalid Epoch length\");\n\n\t\treturn (timestamp - self.genesis) / self.epochLength;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction epochEdgeTimestamps(\n\t\tStorage memory self,\n\t\tuint256 epoch\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256 epochStart, uint256 epochEnd) {\n\t\tepochStart = self.genesis + (epoch * self.epochLength);\n\t\tepochEnd = epochStart + self.epochLength - 1;\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0x834c16512ddf9dab574468909c624119507d569975587f40528a8de1dc48534c","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/Math.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\n// a library for performing various math operations\n\nlibrary Math {\n\tfunction min(uint x, uint y) internal pure returns (uint z) {\n\t\tz = x < y ? x : y;\n\t}\n\n\t// babylonian method (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Methods_of_computing_square_roots#Babylonian_method)\n\tfunction sqrt(uint y) internal pure returns (uint z) {\n\t\tif (y > 3) {\n\t\t\tz = y;\n\t\t\tuint x = y / 2 + 1;\n\t\t\twhile (x < z) {\n\t\t\t\tz = x;\n\t\t\t\tx = (y / x + x) / 2;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t} else if (y != 0) {\n\t\t\tz = 1;\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\terror MathLinearInterpolationInvalidValues(\n\t\tuint256 minIn,\n\t\tuint256 currentIn,\n\t\tuint256 maxIn\n\t);\n\n\t/// @dev out = (minOut * (maxIn - currentIn) + maxOut * (currentIn - minIn)) / (maxIn - minIn)\n\t/// \t https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LinearInterpolation\n\tfunction linearInterpolation(\n\t\tuint256 minIn,\n\t\tuint256 maxIn,\n\t\tuint256 currentIn,\n\t\tuint256 minOut,\n\t\tuint256 maxOut\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\tif (currentIn < minIn || currentIn > maxIn) {\n\t\t\trevert MathLinearInterpolationInvalidValues(\n\t\t\t\tminIn,\n\t\t\t\tcurrentIn,\n\t\t\t\tmaxIn\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\n\t\tuint256 minOutWeighted = minOut * (maxIn - currentIn);\n\t\tuint256 maxOutWeighted = maxOut * (currentIn - minIn);\n\t\tuint256 inDiff = maxIn - minIn;\n\n\t\treturn (minOutWeighted + maxOutWeighted) / inDiff;\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0x0079a0c9124a1c1c6de9c78f790f798ddc8df61161b4747f86accdcb770e6ed3","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/TokenPayments.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol\";\n\nimport { SFT } from \"../abstracts/SFT.sol\";\nimport { WNTV } from \"../tokens/WNTV.sol\";\n\nimport \"hardhat/console.sol\";\n\nstruct TokenPayment {\n\taddress token;\n\tuint256 amount;\n\tuint256 nonce;\n}\n\nlibrary TokenPayments {\n\tusing Address for address;\n\n\tfunction receiveTokenFor(\n\t\tTokenPayment memory payment,\n\t\taddress from,\n\t\taddress to,\n\t\taddress wNTV\n\t) internal {\n\t\tif (payment.token == address(0)) {\n\t\t\t// Wrap native tokens for `to`\n\t\t\tWNTV(payable(wNTV)).receiveFor{ value: payment.amount }(to);\n\t\t} else if (payment.nonce == 0) {\n\t\t\t// ERC20 payment\n\t\t\tIERC20(payment.token).transferFrom(from, to, payment.amount);\n\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t// SFT payment\n\t\t\tSFT(payment.token).safeTransferFrom(\n\t\t\t\tfrom,\n\t\t\t\tto,\n\t\t\t\tpayment.nonce,\n\t\t\t\tpayment.amount,\n\t\t\t\t\"\"\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\tfunction sendFungibleToken(\n\t\taddress token,\n\t\tuint256 amount,\n\t\taddress to\n\t) internal {\n\t\tsendToken(TokenPayment({ token: token, amount: amount, nonce: 0 }), to);\n\t}\n\n\tfunction sendToken(TokenPayment memory payment, address to) internal {\n\t\tif (payment.nonce == 0) {\n\t\t\tuint256 beforeNativeBal = address(this).balance;\n\n\t\t\t// Try to withdraw ETH assuming payment.token is WNTV\n\t\t\t(bool shouldMoveEthBalance, ) = payment.token.call(\n\t\t\t\tabi.encodeWithSignature(\"withdraw(uint256)\", payment.amount)\n\t\t\t);\n\n\t\t\t// Checks to ensure balance movements\n\t\t\tif (shouldMoveEthBalance) {\n\t\t\t\trequire(\n\t\t\t\t\t(beforeNativeBal + payment.amount) == address(this).balance,\n\t\t\t\t\t\"Failed to withdraw WNTV\"\n\t\t\t\t);\n\n\t\t\t\tpayable(to).transfer(payment.amount);\n\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\tIERC20(payment.token).transfer(to, payment.amount);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t// SFT payment\n\t\t\tSFT(payment.token).safeTransferFrom(\n\t\t\t\taddress(this),\n\t\t\t\tto,\n\t\t\t\tpayment.nonce,\n\t\t\t\tpayment.amount,\n\t\t\t\t\"\"\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\tfunction approve(TokenPayment memory payment, address to) internal {\n\t\tif (payment.nonce == 0) {\n\t\t\t// ERC20 approval\n\t\t\tIERC20(payment.token).approve(to, payment.amount);\n\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t// SFT approval\n\t\t\tSFT(payment.token).setApprovalForAll(to, true);\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0x274de6ee69e3b0e980c7fe91e6b8736902f74a3d5d34ecd1d227c380b6e35804","license":"MIT"},"contracts/tokens/GToken/GToken.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\nimport { GTokenLib } from \"./GTokenLib.sol\";\nimport { SFT } from \"../../abstracts/SFT.sol\";\nimport { Epochs } from \"../../libraries/Epochs.sol\";\n\nimport \"../../types.sol\";\n\nstruct GTokenBalance {\n\tuint256 nonce;\n\tuint256 amount;\n\tuint256 votePower;\n\tGTokenLib.Attributes attributes;\n}\n\n/// @title GToken Contract\n/// @notice This contract handles the minting of governance tokens (GToken) used in the Gainz platform.\n/// @dev The contract extends a semi-fungible token (SFT) and uses GToken attributes for staking.\ncontract GToken is SFT {\n\tusing GTokenLib for GTokenLib.Attributes;\n\tusing Epochs for Epochs.Storage;\n\n\t/// @custom:storage-location erc7201:gainz.GToken.storage\n\tstruct GTokenStorage {\n\t\tuint256 totalStakeWeight;\n\t\tmapping(address => uint256) pairSupply;\n\t\tuint256 totalSupply;\n\t\tEpochs.Storage epochs;\n\t}\n\n\t// keccak256(abi.encode(uint256(keccak256(\"gainz.GToken.storage\")) - 1)) & ~bytes32(uint256(0xff));\n\tbytes32 private constant GTOKEN_STORAGE_LOCATION =\n\t\t0xb8e7eb3bf49f83cb3ff588efef6ab82dab4dc692401ee0d26d4dc4d075b6c500;\n\n\tfunction _getGTokenStorage()\n\t\tprivate\n\t\tpure\n\t\treturns (GTokenStorage storage $)\n\t{\n\t\tassembly {\n\t\t\t$.slot := GTOKEN_STORAGE_LOCATION\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Constructor to initialize the GToken contract.\n\t/// @dev Sets the name and symbol of the SFT for GToken.\n\tfunction initialize(\n\t\tEpochs.Storage memory epochs,\n\t\taddress initialOwner\n\t) public initializer {\n\t\t__SFT_init(\"GainzSwap Governance Token\", \"GToken\", initialOwner);\n\t\t_getGTokenStorage().epochs = epochs;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Mints a new GToken for the given address.\n\t/// @dev The function encodes GToken attributes and mints the token with those attributes.\n\t/// @param to The address that will receive the minted GToken.\n\t/// @param rewardPerShare The reward per share at the time of minting.\n\t/// @param epochsLocked The number of epochs for which the LP tokens are locked.\n\t/// @param currentEpoch The current epoch when the GToken is minted.\n\t/// @param lpDetails An array of LiquidityInfo structs representing the LP token payments.\n\t/// @return uint256 The token ID of the newly minted GToken.\n\tfunction mintGToken(\n\t\taddress to,\n\t\tuint256 rewardPerShare,\n\t\tuint256 epochsLocked,\n\t\tuint256 currentEpoch,\n\t\tLiquidityInfo memory lpDetails\n\t) external canUpdate returns (uint256) {\n\t\tif (_getGTokenStorage().epochs.currentEpoch() <= 180) {\n\t\t\trequire(\n\t\t\t\tepochsLocked >= 180,\n\t\t\t\t\"GToken: INVALID_GENESIS_PERIOD_EPOCHS_LOCK\"\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t// Create GToken attributes and compute the stake weight\n\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes memory attributes = GTokenLib\n\t\t\t.Attributes({\n\t\t\t\trewardPerShare: rewardPerShare,\n\t\t\t\tepochStaked: currentEpoch,\n\t\t\t\tlastClaimEpoch: currentEpoch,\n\t\t\t\tepochsLocked: epochsLocked,\n\t\t\t\tstakeWeight: 0,\n\t\t\t\tlpDetails: lpDetails\n\t\t\t})\n\t\t\t.computeStakeWeight();\n\n\t\t// Mint the GToken with the specified attributes and return the token ID\n\t\treturn _mint(to, attributes.supply(), abi.encode(attributes));\n\t}\n\n\tfunction update(\n\t\taddress user,\n\t\tuint256 nonce,\n\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes memory attr\n\t) external canUpdate returns (uint256) {\n\t\tattr = attr.computeStakeWeight();\n\t\treturn super.update(user, nonce, attr.supply(), abi.encode(attr));\n\t}\n\n\t/**\n\t * @notice Retrieves the governance token balance and attributes for a specific user at a given nonce.\n\t * @dev This function checks if the user has a Semi-Fungible Token (SFT) at the provided nonce.\n\t * If the user does not have a balance at the specified nonce, the function will revert with an error.\n\t * The function then returns the governance balance for the user at that nonce.\n\t *\n\t * @param user The address of the user whose balance is being queried.\n\t * @param nonce The nonce for the specific GToken to retrieve.\n\t *\n\t * @return GTokenBalance A struct containing the nonce, amount, and attributes of the GToken.\n\t *\n\t * Requirements:\n\t * - The user must have a GToken balance at the specified nonce.\n\t */\n\tfunction getBalanceAt(\n\t\taddress user,\n\t\tuint256 nonce\n\t) public view returns (GTokenBalance memory) {\n\t\trequire(\n\t\t\thasSFT(user, nonce),\n\t\t\t\"No GToken balance found at nonce for user\"\n\t\t);\n\n\t\treturn\n\t\t\t_packageGTokenBalance(\n\t\t\t\tnonce,\n\t\t\t\tbalanceOf(user, nonce),\n\t\t\t\t_getRawTokenAttributes(nonce)\n\t\t\t);\n\t}\n\n\tfunction _packageGTokenBalance(\n\t\tuint256 nonce,\n\t\tuint256 amount,\n\t\tbytes memory attr\n\t) private view returns (GTokenBalance memory) {\n\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes memory attrUnpacked = abi.decode(\n\t\t\tattr,\n\t\t\t(GTokenLib.Attributes)\n\t\t);\n\t\tuint256 epochsLeft = attrUnpacked.epochsLeft(\n\t\t\tattrUnpacked.epochsElapsed(\n\t\t\t\t_getGTokenStorage().epochs.currentEpoch()\n\t\t\t)\n\t\t);\n\t\tuint256 votePower = attrUnpacked.votePower(epochsLeft);\n\n\t\treturn\n\t\t\tGTokenBalance({\n\t\t\t\tnonce: nonce,\n\t\t\t\tamount: amount,\n\t\t\t\tattributes: attrUnpacked,\n\t\t\t\tvotePower: votePower\n\t\t\t});\n\t}\n\n\t/**\n\t * @notice Retrieves the entire GToken balance and attributes for a specific user.\n\t * @dev This function queries all Semi-Fungible Tokens (SFTs) held by the user and decodes\n\t * the attributes for each GToken.\n\t *\n\t * @param user The address of the user whose balances are being queried.\n\t *\n\t * @return GTokenBalance[] An array of structs, each containing the nonce, amount, and attributes\n\t * of the user's GToken.\n\t */\n\tfunction getGTokenBalance(\n\t\taddress user\n\t) public view returns (GTokenBalance[] memory) {\n\t\tSftBalance[] memory _sftBals = _sftBalance(user);\n\t\tGTokenBalance[] memory balance = new GTokenBalance[](\n\t\t\t_sftBals.length\n\t\t);\n\n\t\tfor (uint256 i = 0; i < _sftBals.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tSftBalance memory _sftBal = _sftBals[i];\n\n\t\t\tbalance[i] = _packageGTokenBalance(\n\t\t\t\t_sftBal.nonce,\n\t\t\t\t_sftBal.amount,\n\t\t\t\t_sftBal.attributes\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\n\t\treturn balance;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction totalStakeWeight() public view returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn _getGTokenStorage().totalStakeWeight;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction totalSupply() public view returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn _getGTokenStorage().totalSupply;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction decimal() external pure returns (uint8) {\n\t\treturn 18;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @dev the attributes beign updated must have be updated by calling the `computeStakeWeight` method on them\n\tfunction _update(\n\t\taddress from,\n\t\taddress to,\n\t\tuint256[] memory ids,\n\t\tuint256[] memory values\n\t) internal override {\n\t\tsuper._update(from, to, ids, values);\n\n\t\tfor (uint256 i; i < ids.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tuint256 id = ids[i];\n\t\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes memory attr = abi.decode(\n\t\t\t\t_getRawTokenAttributes(id),\n\t\t\t\t(GTokenLib.Attributes)\n\t\t\t);\n\n\t\t\tuint256 supply = attr.supply();\n\t\t\tGTokenStorage storage $ = _getGTokenStorage();\n\t\t\tif (from == address(0) && to != address(0)) {\n\t\t\t\t// We are minting, so increase staking weight\n\t\t\t\t$.totalStakeWeight += attr.stakeWeight;\n\t\t\t\t$.totalSupply += supply;\n\t\t\t\t$.pairSupply[attr.lpDetails.pair] += supply;\n\t\t\t} else if (from != address(0) && to == address(0)) {\n\t\t\t\t// We are burning, so decrease staking weight\n\t\t\t\t$.totalStakeWeight -= attr.stakeWeight;\n\t\t\t\t$.totalSupply -= supply;\n\t\t\t\t$.pairSupply[attr.lpDetails.pair] -= supply;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Splits a GToken into portions and distributes it to the specified addresses.\n\t/// @dev If an address is the zero address, the allotted portion is burned.\n\t/// This function can be called by the contract owner or the token's owner.\n\t/// @param nonce The nonce of the GToken to split.\n\t/// @param addresses An array of addresses to receive the split portions.\n\t/// @param liquidityPortions An array of liquidityPortions representing the amounts to be split.\n\t/// @return splitNonces An array of nonces for the newly minted split tokens.\n\tfunction split(\n\t\tuint256 nonce,\n\t\taddress[] calldata addresses,\n\t\tuint256[] calldata liquidityPortions\n\t) external returns (uint256[] memory splitNonces) {\n\t\trequire(\n\t\t\taddresses.length > 0 &&\n\t\t\t\taddresses.length == liquidityPortions.length,\n\t\t\t\"Invalid Addresses and portions\"\n\t\t);\n\n\t\taddress user = addresses[0];\n\n\t\trequire(\n\t\t\thasSFT(user, nonce) || isOperator(msg.sender),\n\t\t\t\"Caller not authorized\"\n\t\t);\n\n\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes memory attributes = getBalanceAt(user, nonce)\n\t\t\t.attributes;\n\t\tGTokenLib.Attributes[] memory splitAttributes = attributes.split(\n\t\t\tliquidityPortions\n\t\t);\n\n\t\tsplitNonces = new uint256[](splitAttributes.length);\n\t\tfor (uint256 i = 0; i < splitAttributes.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tsplitNonces[i] = _mint(\n\t\t\t\taddresses[i],\n\t\t\t\tsplitAttributes[i].supply(),\n\t\t\t\tabi.encode(splitAttributes[i])\n\t\t\t);\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t// Burn the original token after splitting\n\t\t_burn(user, nonce, attributes.supply());\n\t}\n\n\tfunction pairSupply(address pair) public view returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn _getGTokenStorage().pairSupply[pair];\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0xda3d10ed3cff953b979c02e80f54f76b9c48777eafb5e708b84aaba5be552ea1","license":"MIT"},"contracts/tokens/GToken/GTokenLib.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\nimport { TokenPayment } from \"../../libraries/TokenPayments.sol\";\nimport { Math } from \"../../libraries/Math.sol\";\n\nimport \"../../types.sol\";\n\n/// @title GToken Library\n/// @notice This library provides functions for managing GToken attributes, including staking, claiming rewards, and calculating stake weights and rewards.\nlibrary GTokenLib {\n\t/// @dev Attributes struct holds the data related to a participant's stake in the GToken contract.\n\tstruct Attributes {\n\t\tuint256 rewardPerShare;\n\t\tuint256 epochStaked;\n\t\tuint256 epochsLocked;\n\t\tuint256 lastClaimEpoch;\n\t\tuint256 stakeWeight;\n\t\tLiquidityInfo lpDetails;\n\t}\n\n\t// Constants for lock periods and percentage loss calculations\n\tuint256 public constant MIN_EPOCHS_LOCK = 0;\n\tuint256 public constant MAX_EPOCHS_LOCK = 1080;\n\tuint256 public constant MIN_EPOCHS_LOCK_PERCENT_LOSS = 55e4; // 55% in basis points\n\tuint256 public constant MAX_EPOCHS_LOCK_PERCENT_LOSS = 15e4; // 15% in basis points\n\tuint256 public constant MAX_PERCENT_LOSS = 100e4; // 100% in basis points\n\n\t/// @notice Computes the stake weight based on the amount of LP tokens and the epochs locked.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @return The updated Attributes struct with the computed stake weight.\n\tfunction computeStakeWeight(\n\t\tAttributes memory self\n\t) internal pure returns (Attributes memory) {\n\t\tuint256 epochsLocked = self.epochsLocked;\n\t\trequire(\n\t\t\tMIN_EPOCHS_LOCK <= epochsLocked && epochsLocked <= MAX_EPOCHS_LOCK,\n\t\t\t\"GToken: Invalid epochsLocked\"\n\t\t);\n\n\t\tif (self.lpDetails.liquidity == 0) {\n\t\t\tself.lpDetails.liqValue = 0;\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t// Calculate stake weight based on supply and epochs locked\n\t\tself.stakeWeight = self.lpDetails.liqValue * epochsLocked;\n\n\t\treturn self;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Splits an `Attributes` struct into multiple portions based on the specified liquidity portions.\n\t/// @param self The original `Attributes` struct to split.\n\t/// @param liquidityPortions An array of percentages (as portions of 1e18) to divide the liquidity into.\n\t/// @return splitAttributes An array of new `Attributes` structs with the allocated portions.\n\tfunction split(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\tuint256[] memory liquidityPortions\n\t) internal pure returns (Attributes[] memory splitAttributes) {\n\t\t// Initialize the array to store split `Attributes` structs\n\t\tsplitAttributes = new Attributes[](liquidityPortions.length);\n\n\t\tuint256 portionSum;\n\t\tuint256 liqValueSum;\n\n\t\t// Loop through each portion and split attributes\n\t\tfor (uint256 i = 0; i < liquidityPortions.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tuint256 splitLiquidity = liquidityPortions[i];\n\t\t\tuint256 liqValue = (splitLiquidity * self.lpDetails.liqValue) /\n\t\t\t\tself.lpDetails.liquidity;\n\n\t\t\tsplitAttributes[i] = computeStakeWeight(\n\t\t\t\tAttributes({\n\t\t\t\t\trewardPerShare: self.rewardPerShare,\n\t\t\t\t\tepochStaked: self.epochStaked,\n\t\t\t\t\tepochsLocked: self.epochsLocked,\n\t\t\t\t\tlastClaimEpoch: self.lastClaimEpoch,\n\t\t\t\t\tstakeWeight: 0,\n\t\t\t\t\tlpDetails: LiquidityInfo({\n\t\t\t\t\t\ttoken0: self.lpDetails.token0,\n\t\t\t\t\t\ttoken1: self.lpDetails.token1,\n\t\t\t\t\t\tpair: self.lpDetails.pair,\n\t\t\t\t\t\tliquidity: splitLiquidity,\n\t\t\t\t\t\tliqValue: liqValue\n\t\t\t\t\t})\n\t\t\t\t})\n\t\t\t);\n\n\t\t\tportionSum += splitAttributes[i].lpDetails.liquidity;\n\t\t\tliqValueSum += splitAttributes[i].lpDetails.liqValue;\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t// last portion gets un used liqValue, if any\n\t\tsplitAttributes[splitAttributes.length - 1].lpDetails.liqValue +=\n\t\t\tself.lpDetails.liqValue -\n\t\t\tliqValueSum;\n\n\t\treturn splitAttributes;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction supply(Attributes memory self) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn self.lpDetails.liqValue;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the number of epochs that have elapsed since staking.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @param currentEpoch The current epoch.\n\t/// @return The number of epochs elapsed since staking.\n\tfunction epochsElapsed(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\tuint256 currentEpoch\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\tif (currentEpoch <= self.epochStaked) {\n\t\t\treturn 0;\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn currentEpoch - self.epochStaked;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the number of epochs remaining until the stake is unlocked.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @param currentEpoch The current epoch.\n\t/// @return The number of epochs remaining until unlock.\n\tfunction epochsLeft(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\tuint256 currentEpoch\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\tuint256 elapsed = epochsElapsed(self, currentEpoch);\n\t\tif (elapsed >= self.epochsLocked) {\n\t\t\treturn 0;\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn self.epochsLocked - elapsed;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the user's vote power based on the locked GToken amount and remaining epochs.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @return The calculated vote power as a uint256.\n\t/// @dev see https://wiki.sovryn.com/en/governance/about-sovryn-governance\n\tfunction votePower(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\tuint256 currentEpoch\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\tuint256 xPow = (MAX_EPOCHS_LOCK - epochsLeft(self, currentEpoch)) ** 2;\n\t\tuint256 mPow = MAX_EPOCHS_LOCK ** 2;\n\n\t\tuint256 voteWeight = ((9 * xPow) / mPow) + 1;\n\n\t\treturn self.lpDetails.liqValue * voteWeight;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the number of epochs since the last reward claim.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @return The number of epochs since the last claim.\n\tfunction epochsUnclaimed(\n\t\tAttributes memory self\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\treturn self.epochsLocked - self.lastClaimEpoch;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the amount of value to keep based on epochs elapsed and locked.\n\t/// @param self The Attributes struct of the participant.\n\t/// @param value The total value amount.\n\t/// @param currentEpoch The current epoch.\n\t/// @return The amount of value to keep after applying penalties.\n\tfunction valueToKeep(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\tuint256 value,\n\t\tuint256 currentEpoch\n\t) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\t// prevent division by 0\n\t\trequire(self.epochsLocked > 0, \"GTokenLib: INVALID_EPOCHS_LOCKED\");\n\n\t\t// Calculate percentage loss based on epochs locked\n\t\tuint256 epochsLockedPercentLoss = Math.linearInterpolation(\n\t\t\tMIN_EPOCHS_LOCK,\n\t\t\tMAX_EPOCHS_LOCK,\n\t\t\tself.epochsLocked,\n\t\t\tMIN_EPOCHS_LOCK_PERCENT_LOSS,\n\t\t\tMAX_EPOCHS_LOCK_PERCENT_LOSS\n\t\t);\n\n\t\t// Calculate the percentage of the value to keep after penalties\n\t\tuint256 percentLost = epochsElapsedPercentLoss(\n\t\t\tepochsElapsed(self, currentEpoch),\n\t\t\tepochsLockedPercentLoss,\n\t\t\tself.epochsLocked\n\t\t);\n\n\t\tuint256 percentToKeep = MAX_PERCENT_LOSS - percentLost;\n\t\treturn (value * percentToKeep) / MAX_PERCENT_LOSS;\n\t}\n\n\tfunction hasNativeToken(\n\t\tAttributes memory self,\n\t\taddress wNativeToken\n\t) internal pure returns (bool itHas) {\n\t\titHas =\n\t\t\tself.lpDetails.token0 == wNativeToken ||\n\t\t\tself.lpDetails.token1 == wNativeToken;\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Calculates the percentage loss of the reward based on elapsed epochs.\n\t/// @param elapsed The number of epochs elapsed since staking.\n\t/// @param lockedPercentLoss The percentage loss based on epochs locked.\n\t/// @param locked The total epochs locked.\n\t/// @return The percentage loss based on epochs elapsed.\n\tfunction epochsElapsedPercentLoss(\n\t\tuint256 elapsed,\n\t\tuint256 lockedPercentLoss,\n\t\tuint256 locked\n\t) private pure returns (uint256) {\n\t\tuint256 remainingTime = elapsed > locked ? 0 : locked - elapsed;\n\n\t\treturn\n\t\t\tMath.linearInterpolation(\n\t\t\t\t0,\n\t\t\t\tlocked,\n\t\t\t\tremainingTime,\n\t\t\t\t0,\n\t\t\t\tlockedPercentLoss\n\t\t\t);\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0x271f6479d8dc0f8565ac765542f55cf3b2cae0a08fea3e1c1d74b396211c4960","license":"MIT"},"contracts/tokens/WNTV.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\nimport { ERC20Upgradeable } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/token/ERC20/ERC20Upgradeable.sol\";\n\n/// @title WNTV (Wrapped Native Token)\n/// @notice This contract wraps native tokens into ERC20-compliant WNTV tokens.\ncontract WNTV is ERC20Upgradeable {\n\t/// @notice Constructor initializes the ERC20Upgradeable token with name and symbol.\n\tfunction initialize() public initializer {\n\t\t__ERC20_init(\"Wrapped Native Token\", \"WNTV\");\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Unwraps WNTV tokens back into native tokens.\n\t/// @param amount The amount of WNTV tokens to unwrap.\n\t/// @dev This function burns the specified amount of WNTV tokens and sends the equivalent amount of native tokens to the user.\n\tfunction withdraw(uint256 amount) public {\n\t\trequire(balanceOf(msg.sender) >= amount, \"WNTV: Insufficient balance\");\n\t\t_burn(msg.sender, amount);\n\t\tpayable(msg.sender).transfer(amount);\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Allows an approved spender to use WNTV tokens on behalf of the sender.\n\t/// @param owner The address of the token owner.\n\t/// @param spender The address of the spender allowed to use the tokens.\n\t/// @dev This function mints WNTV tokens to the owner and approves the spender to use the minted tokens.\n\tfunction receiveForSpender(address owner, address spender) public payable {\n\t\t_mint(owner, msg.value);\n\t\t_approve(owner, spender, msg.value);\n\t}\n\n\t/// @notice Wraps native tokens into WNTV tokens for `owner`. The amount of WNTV minted equals the amount of native tokens sent.\n\t/// @param owner The address of the token owner.\n\t/// @dev This function mints WNTV tokens equivalent to the amount of native tokens sent by the user.\n\tfunction receiveFor(address owner) public payable {\n\t\t_mint(owner, msg.value);\n\t}\n}\n","keccak256":"0xbcdddc66b365f2b1ac16b235aee6e83e0d547524c9f021845115bea67f2ca34a","license":"MIT"},"contracts/types.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later\npragma solidity ^0.8.28;\n\n// import \"hardhat/console.sol\";\n\nstruct LiquidityInfo {\n\taddress token0;\n\taddress token1;\n\tuint256 liquidity;\n\tuint256 liqValue;\n\taddress pair;\n}\n\nfunction createLiquidityInfoArray(\n\tLiquidityInfo memory element\n) pure returns (LiquidityInfo[] memory array) {\n\tarray = new LiquidityInfo[](1);\n\tarray[0] = element;\n}\n","keccak256":"0x0e1a8c82d64dd0c82dd81c5088cf36d29268cb5dfa28673c40672a9952fccf91","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later"},"hardhat/console.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma
